thread.title: Teenager Snapchats foul-mouthed tirade at taxi driver before she challenges him to a FIGHT after he gets lost
thread.title_full: Teenager Snapchats foul-mouthed tirade at taxi driver before she challenges him to a FIGHT after he gets lost

author: Chris Baynes
title: Teenager Snapchats foul-mouthed tirade at taxi driver before she challenges him to a FIGHT after he gets lost
text:
Thank you for subscribing!   
A teenager Snapchatted herself launching an extraordinary foul-mouthed rant at a taxi driver as he struggled to find her destination. 
Tamika Dudley unleashed a furious tirade at the cabbie before challenging him to a FIGHT after he got lost. 
The shocking footage went viral after the Brisbane 19-year-old posted it on Snapchat . 
And the teenager brazenly celebrated her newfound notoriety, boasting about how it had boosted her social media profile. The woman unleashes a torrent of abuse at the taxi driver (Photo: snapchat) 
In the expletive-filled clip, she screams at the driver: "I put in the GPS, so follow the GPS. What's so hard? What's so f***ing hard about following the GPS?" 
"You picked me up and you're a cab driver and you're telling me to get out because you don't know where you're going?" Read More Teenager fumes after boss at posh steak restaurant rejected her for waitress job 'with crying emoji' The teen broadcast her foul-mouthed rant over Snapchat (Photo: snapchat) 
She flicks a middle finger at the cabbie behind his back, before ranting: "I swear to God, if you get lost again, there's gonna be a lot of trouble so make sure you know where you're going, swear to f***ing God." 
Apparently addressing Snapchat followers who challenged her over her foul language and aggression, the teenager says: "Everyone saying 'don't talk to people like that,' I will talk to you like you're a f***ing piece of s**t on the road if you you this to me. 
"If you take me on a 50-minute cab ride, I will talk to you like s***." The driver looking for the address (Photo: snapchat) 
Tamika claimed her journey should have taken only 10 minutes. 
After eventually reaching her destination, she angrily rejects the driver's request for payment before threatening to "kick [his] f***ing head in" and challenging him to a fight. 
She screams: "Get the f**k out [of the car] - let's go." 
The cabbie then drove off, according to a caption the teen added to the video. Read More Far-right activist's shocking rant on Channel 4 News: 'Take in a Syrian refugee, I hope you don't get raped' 
She later wrote on Facebook: "All over the news for going of [sic] at the cab driver. HATE ALL YOU WANT. 
"Before the news I had 92k viewers on snap chat thanks to news for making that number so much higher, I love hate". 
Black and White Cabs, the firm whose driver appeared in the footage, declined to comment. 
But one cabbie told Australian TV station 7 News such abuse was not rare. 
He said: "I've had it before, this, myself, but in my experience you calm the passenger down." Like us on Facebook
